code:
module TopModule (
    input logic clk,
    input logic shift_ena,
    input logic count_ena,
    input logic data,
    output logic [3:0] q
);

    logic [3:0] shift_reg;

    always @(posedge clk) begin
        if (shift_ena) begin
            shift_reg <= {shift_reg[2:0], data}; // Shift in data MSB first
        end else if (count_ena) begin
            shift_reg <= shift_reg - 1'b1; // Decrement the counter
        end
    end

    assign q = shift_reg;

endmodule
